RING_BUFFER_STREAM_CONFIG

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x3c
Size:
0x4

Description

Configuration of the pre-trigger and post-trigger stream length

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:12] post_trigger_len rw 0x400 -
[11:2] pre_trigger_len rw 0x100 -
[1] soft_rstn rw 0x1 -
[0] in_stream_en rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

post_trigger_len

Number of post-trigger samples

pre_trigger_len

Number of pre-trigger samples

soft_rstn

Software-initiated reset

in_stream_en

Enable input stream
